abilities.name: Expertise
abilities.description: Choose two of your skill proficiencies, your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses either of the chosen proficiencies.

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.description: Once per turn, deal extra damage to a creature you hit with an attack if you have advantage on the attack roll.

abilities.name: Cunning Action
abilities.description: Your quick thinking and agility allow you to move and act quickly. You can take a bonus action on each of your turns in combat.

abilities.name: Roguish Archetype
abilities.description: Choose an archetype that you emulate, such as Thief, Assassin, or Arcane Trickster.

abilities.name: Ability Score Improvement
abilities.description: Improve one ability score of your choice.

abilities.name: Uncanny Dodge
abilities.description: When an attacker hits you with an attack, you can use your reaction to halve the attack's damage against you.

abilities.name: Expertise
abilities.description: Choose two more of your skill proficiencies to gain the Expertise benefit.

abilities.name: Evasion
abilities.description: When subjected to an effect that allows you to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, you instead take no damage on a successful save and only half damage on a failed save.

abilities.name: Ability Score Improvement
abilities.description: Improve one ability score of your choice.

abilities.name: Roguish Archetype Feature
abilities.description: Gain a new feature related to your chosen Roguish Archetype.

abilities.description: Improve one ability score of your choice.

abilities.name: Reliable Talent
abilities.description: Whenever you make an ability check that lets you add your proficiency bonus, you can treat a d20 roll of 9 or lower as a 10.

abilities.name: Blindsense
abilities.description: If you are able to hear, you are aware of the location of any hidden or invisible creature within 10 feet of you.

abilities.name: Slippery Mind
abilities.description: You gain proficiency in Wisdom saving throws.
